sentences.en: But you always get a smile and some witty repartee from him that provides an uplift.
sentences.cn: 但柏利总是笑容可掬,妙语如珠,让你精神一振.

sentences.en: He is very sharp, a quick thinker and swift with repartee.
sentences.cn: 他非常机敏，反应很快，并且能说会道。

sentences.en: He was a brilliant debater and his gift of repartee was celebrated.
sentences.cn: 他擅长辩论,以敏于应答著称.

sentences.en: He was acclaimed for his acerbic wit and repartee.
sentences.cn: 他以一针见血的妙语巧辩而备受好评。

sentences.en: I enjoy listening to their witty repartee.
sentences.cn: 我很喜欢听他们妙语连珠的对答.

sentences.en: If the post - match repartee sparkled, it was more than could be said for the game itself.
sentences.cn: 如果赛后能够妙语连珠, 说的最多的还是比赛本身.

sentences.en: James Boswell admired Samuel Johnson's power of repartee.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯·斯威尔钦羡山姆尔·森机敏的应答能力.

sentences.en: Repartee is what you wish you'd say.
sentences.cn: 所谓妙语,就是你会说“我当时也那么讲就好了”的话.

sentences.en: Thank you for today's repartee . I have enjoyed it.
sentences.cn: 感谢你们今天睿智的语言.

sentences.en: The repartee flew back and forth across the dinner table.
sentences.cn: 宴会上妙语连珠对答如流.

sentences.en: This diplomat possessed an excellent gift for repartee.
sentences.cn: 这位外交官具有卓越的应对才能.

sentences.en: When a designer repartee a file for display, it can use this interface to improve performance.
sentences.cn: 当设计器重新分析用于显示的文件时, 它可以使用此接口来提高性能.

trans.tran_cn: （做出）机敏的应答，机智的反驳
trans.tran_en: conversation which is fast and full of intelligent and amusing remarks and replies
